motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval as Amended
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda with item #6 moved to Business Items including: • Approval of March 13, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • Approval of Contract with DeKalb Community Service Board to Provide a Behavioral Licenses Clinician

motions.title: Resolution for New Opioid Settlement
motions.description: Authorization for City Manager to have settlement authority with respect to all national opioid settlements and be designated the city's point of contact with signature authority on all related documents, subject to legal approval.

motions.title: Update to DeKalb County Multi-Jurisdictional Hazard Mitigation Plan
motions.description: Approval of update to DeKalb County Multi-Jurisdictional Hazard Mitigation Plan.

motions.title: Park Master Plan for 4809/4819 Vermack Rd
motions.description: Approval of Park Master Plan for 4809/4819 Vermack Road with addition of note #6 requiring Public Works Department to improve existing path between Village Mill and Heritage of Dunwoody Subdivisions within next 2 years.

motions.title: Contract to Develop a Local Road Safety Action Plan
motions.description: Approval of contract to develop a local road safety action plan.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Police Officers
specialEvents.description: Chief Grogan introduced and Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officers Jonah Amos, Justin Davis, and Adam Gallop.

specialEvents.title: Dunwoody High School Youth City Council Presentation
specialEvents.description: Presentation by DHS Youth City Council program with thanks to Mayor, Council, and Jennifer Boettcher for support.

specialEvents.title: Caleb Mahle Recognition
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch recognized and congratulated Caleb Mahle on becoming Dunwoody High School's Valedictorian.

discussionItems.title: Contract for Citywide Pavement Assessment Update
discussionItems.description: Update on road pavement assessment with recommendation to award contract to KCI Technologies to improve roads within the City of Dunwoody.

discussionItems.title: Reapportionment
discussionItems.description: Recommendation to keep same districts with future council focus on what districts should be.

discussionItems.title: Ethics Principles and Pledges Resolution
discussionItems.description: Recommendation to place readopting ethics principles and pledges resolution on consent at next meeting.

notes: National Kidney Month proclamation postponed until honoree available
Council Member Seconder participated via Zoom
Council Member Heneghan absent from meeting
